title: Taylor Swift Fearless(ly) Re-records Old Albums to Take Scooter Braun Out
description:
Taylor Swift has been trying for years to get ownership over her original 6 albums.  She’s pushed over the edge when her self-proclaimed mortal enemy Scooter Braun buys her albums.  In an ultimate boss move, she begins re-recording them, potentially diluting the value of her original albums and therefore Scooter’s profits.  Tune in as we break it all down!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
